paragraphs.text: As you already know, Protocol extension is amazing because it provides default implementations without having to define required methods and properties. Let’s review.

b823ecb1730a.title: Good question, it’s in fact largely based on your imagination and visualization.

paragraphs.text: Good question, it’s in fact largely based on your imagination and visualization. The questions is like how can a Swiss army knife useful? Of course, we don’t need to use it for simple cases, but I recommend you just visualize how game characters are designed and visualize how generic protocol would fit. :)

affc94e48d29.title: I think the best way to introduce someone to associated types in protocols is by making the…

paragraphs.text: I think the best way to introduce someone to associated types in protocols is by making the generics parallelism. In my case, it was the other way around though, i.e. first associated types and then generics. Great stuff Bob! 👍

paragraphs.name: 16c3

paragraphs.text: You cannot declare a variable of such type. Let’s say, we will talk about the delegation — the most common case of using the protocols, the generic protocol does not fit for that case.
Mainly the generic protocols make a nice, interesting code and… that’s all?
